The image was posted on Facebook on Sept: 2019, and has been shared more than 130 times since.
The Sinhalese: language text superimposed across the image translates to "This is not the work of the Pohottuwa’s patriotic Karuna" and "You slaves, there is not a single individual who harmed our religion in the pohottuwa."
The Sinhalese caption on the image state: 4. A reverse image search on Google led to the discovery that the image is actually from a fatal road accident in Cambodia in 2019, not depicting the killings of Buddhist monks.
